greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating row sums of Sheffer triangle A143496 (4-restricted Stirling2 numbers).
comment: In order to have A143496 as a lower triangular Sheffer matrix one uses row and column offsets 0 (not 4).
formula: a(n) = exp(1) * Sum_{k>=0} (-1)^k * (k + 4)^n / k!. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 20 2019
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 06 2011
